definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="myNBTdata" type="MCItem">myNBTdata</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">item_destroyed</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GiantKnife</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_mainhand_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BrokenGiantKnife</field></block></value><next><block type="item_nbt_copy"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="b"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
